Text.Page:
We can stab, burn, shock, slice, fold, spindle, and mutilate all the nagas we want, and they'll just hatch more.

We need to get out of the up-close-and-personal killing business and take out the nagas remotely. With traps!

But traps need bait. And the best bait is a fruit called aefra, which the nagas can't get enough of. Look for the ivy with the red flowers.
I can bait dozens of naga traps with this much fruit. Outstanding work!

Unless you want to traipse all over this island and crawl into every naga hole, you'll bring me more aefras.

Think it through, .
